sentences: On November 27 and 28, 2005, a substantial outbreak of tornadoes occurred in the Central United States.
It was the fourth and final major outbreak of the unusually active month; the other three occurring on November 6, 12 and 15.
In addition, the same system produced a major blizzard in the northern and western Great Plains.
Overall, the outbreak resulted in two fatalities, one in Missouri and the other in Arkansas.
